author: cskiraly
content: Technically that could work, but I'm not sure what it achieves. Some onion routing solutions already apply some level of delay, traffic shaping, and traffic flow confidentiality to  mask the traffic pattern.

author: cskiraly
content: The Vac team of IFT (who also does Waku) has several past and ongoing works related to anonymity and privacy in Ethereum. If you are interested in the topic, worth contacting them.
